title: Manta Point, Nusa Penida Snorkeling (Half-day)
overview: Snorkel with majestic manta rays at Manta Point, Nusa Penida, and enjoy the vibrant marine life.

stops.description: Take a fast boat to Nusa Penida.
Arrive and snorkel with manta rays.
Relax on the beach or explore nearby spots.

title: Manta Point, Nusa Penida Full Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of snorkeling, beach relaxation, and marine exploration at Manta Point, Nusa Penida.

stops.description: Take a fast boat to Nusa Penida.
Arrive and snorkel with manta rays.
Relax on the beach or explore more snorkeling spots.
Lunch at a local beach cafe (optional).
Explore other snorkeling sites or relax at Manta Point.
